department.ch: 能源工程研究所碩士班

goal.en: "This course is designed for senior and graduated students who are interested in computational fluid dynamics (CFD). It provides a comprehensive understanding of solving the PDEs in fluid dynamics from physics, mathematics, and numerical technology perspectives. Programming practices are also required to further understand the numerical algorithms."
goal.ch: "This course is designed for senior and graduated students who are interested in computational fluid dynamics (CF). It provides a comprehensive understanding of solving the PDEs in fluid dynamics from physics, mathematics, and numerical technology perspectives. content.en:
(1) Navier-Stokes Equations & and Reduced Equations
(2) Model Equations: Diffusion Equation, Elliptic Equation, and Wave Equation
(3) Discretization Methods: Finite Difference, Finite Volume, and spectral method
(4) Taylor Series Expansion and Truncation Error Analysis
(*) Higher Order scheme & Spectral like Scheme
(5) Richardson Extrapolation
(6) Stability, Consistency, and Convergence
(7) Stability Analysis: Fourier (Von Neumann) & Spectral method
(*) Enhancement of the Accuracy: Grid Refinement versus Higher Order Scheme
(8) Explicit & Implicit Methods
(9) Upwind and Flux Splitting Methods
(10) Concepts of Artificial Dissipation
(11) Solving Linear System of Equations:
Narrow banded Matrix: Thomas Algorithm
Different Preconditioning Techniques
(12) Eigenvector Annihilation
(13) Multigrid Method
(14) PDE in curvilinear coordinate.
(15) (Multi-block)-Structured & Unstructured Grids
(16) Compressible Flow in Conservative Form
